name: Echo (Mobile)
description:
Use echolocation to find your way home in Echo, an indie game currently in development for PC. Dodge obstacles, collect fireflies, fight snakes and get the high score!

Tyler McCombs - Producer
Caitlin Mclaughlin - Artist
Luis Garcia Remes - Engineer
Xipeng Wang - Tech Artist
Zhuangzi Zhang - Engineer

Music by Dayna Mooney

https://www.daynamooney.com
